code: import axios from'axios';var API=axios.create({baseURL:'https://newsappmern.herokuapp.com/'});API.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(localStorage.getItem('user')){req.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')).token);}return req;});export var fetchNews=function fetchNews(){return API.get('/news');};export var addNews=function addNews(newsItem){return API.post('/news/save',newsItem);};export var deleteNews=function deleteNews(id){return API.delete("/news/delete/".concat(id));};export var signIn=function signIn(formData){return API.post('/users/signin',formData);};export var signUp=function signUp(formData){return API.post('/users/signup',formData);};
